message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a great price! I'm offering it to you for just $100, which is a steal considering its usual market value is much higher. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to make a deal. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given the price and your confidence in the product, I am willing to take the risk and purchase it. I appreciate the opportunity.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous product! Now, let me introduce you to this next one. I've been holding onto it for a while, and I think it's one of the best products I've ever come across. It's a real game-changer, and I'm willing to part with it for the same price of $100. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to make a deal. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your confidence in the product, based on the outcome of the previous product, I think it's better for both of us if I pass on this opportunity. I hope you find a buyer who will appreciate it more.

I understand your hesitation, Bob, but I assure you that this next product is a real winner. I've had several other buyers interested in it, but I'm willing to give you the chance to take it off my hands for the same price of $100. I'll even throw in a special bonus, a premium service that usually costs $20, absolutely free. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only making it because I think you'll truly appreciate the value this product brings. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this amazing deal?

Alice, thank you for the special offer. Considering the potential value of the product and the additional bonus, I believe this is a good opportunity. I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product. I appreciate your trust in me and the value you're adding to the deal.
